alert.note: Alert for Bourbon; Harrison; Nicholas (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 10:22PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN BOURBON...WESTERN NICHOLAS AND CENTRAL HARRISON COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 PM EDT... At 1022 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Cynthiana, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cynthiana, Carlisle, Millersburg, Shawhan, Blacks Crossroads, Ruddels Mills, Oddville, Ellisville, Headquarters and Claysville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
